fortune.title: Daily Fortune
fortune.description: Check today's fortune with your birth date
fortune.inputDescription: We'll tell you today's fortune based on your zodiac and Chinese zodiac
fortune.disclaimer: This is just for fun. Your choices matter most!

messages.0: Today is a day with good energy for a new start.
messages.1: Look around calmly and you may discover hidden opportunities.
messages.2: A positive mindset will lead to good results.
messages.3: It's okay to take a break today. You need to recharge.
messages.4: Communication with people around you will bring luck.
messages.5: Being grateful for small things brings great happiness.
messages.6: Today's choices can change your future. Decide carefully.
messages.7: Unexpected good news may come your way.
messages.8: Believe in yourself and take a step forward.
messages.9: Today will be a peaceful day.

advices.0: Don't rush your decisions. It's good to take a tempo break.
advices.1: Try reaching out to people around you first. It could be a good connection.
advices.2: How about taking some time for yourself today?
advices.3: Start achieving your goals one small step at a time.
advices.4: Try expressing your feelings honestly. You can be understood.
advices.5: It's a good time to try something new.
advices.6: It's better to move according to plan today.
advices.7: Don't dwell on the past, move forward.
advices.8: Pay a little more attention to your health.

general.0: It will be a smooth day overall. Have confidence.
general.1: Unexpected changes may occur. Be flexible.
general.2: A peaceful day. Things will proceed without major issues.
general.3: Small fortunes may come your way today.
general.4: It might be tough, but it will get better by evening.
general.5: You can get help from those around you. Don't worry alone.
general.6: Concentration is high today. Good for handling important tasks.
general.7: You may have mood swings. Find peace of mind.

love.0: Have a deep conversation with someone precious to you.
love.1: New connections may come your way today.
love.2: Try to understand the other person's heart.
love.3: Small gestures can give great impressions.
love.4: Time alone is also precious. Take a break.
love.5: Expressing your honest feelings will get good responses.
love.6: Take it easy in your relationships.

money.0: Unexpected income may come your way.
money.1: It's better to avoid impulsive spending.
money.2: Good day to review your financial plans.
money.3: Small saving habits create big results.
money.4: Better to seek stability than investments.
money.5: Spending where needed will return as greater value.
money.7: Try to reduce spending and prepare for the future.

health.0: It will be an energetic day.
health.1: Don't forget to drink enough water.
health.2: Light exercise helps refresh your mood.
health.3: Pay attention to improving your sleep quality.
health.5: Fill up your energy with a healthy diet.
health.6: Don't overdo it and rest appropriately.
health.7: A positive mind also has a good effect on health.

work.0: Work efficiency is high today. Handle important tasks.
work.1: Cooperation with colleagues will bring good results.
work.2: New ideas may come to you.
work.4: Focus on important tasks rather than urgent ones.
work.5: Learning opportunities may come your way.
work.6: Calm progress will lead to good results.
work.7: Taking a short break will bring better ideas.

love.0: Listen to your partner until the end.
love.2: High expectations may lead to disappointment.
love.3: Don't put only your feelings first.

money.2: Think carefully before lending money to friends.

work.5: Don't try to do everything alone.
work.6: Don't get swayed by urgent tasks.

avoids.haste: Rushing is not good today. Take things slowly.
avoids.overthinking: Don't overthink. A simple approach works better.
avoids.conflict: Avoid arguments today. Stepping back is also wisdom.
avoids.laziness: Laziness is today's enemy. Start with small things.
avoids.doubt: Stop doubting yourself. You're doing great.
avoids.greed: Let go of greed. What you have is enough.
avoids.stubbornness: Being stubborn may make you miss good opportunities.
avoids.isolation: Don't be alone. Stay with people around you.
avoids.negativity: Negative thoughts can ruin your day.
avoids.excess: Excess is not good today. Moderation is best.

mbti.title: MBTI Personality Test

intro.title: Discover Your MBTI Type
intro.description: Answer honestly for the most accurate results

mbti.disclaimer: This test is for entertainment purposes only and is not a professional psychological assessment.

questions.ei1: Talking to new people gives me energy
questions.ei2: I feel restless when I'm alone for too long
questions.ei3: I tend to speak up first in meetings
questions.ei4: I feel my thoughts are understood even without speaking
questions.ei5: I find it easy to keep a conversation going spontaneously
questions.ei6: I get tired easily when with many people for a long time
questions.ei7: I want to break the silence when it's too quiet
questions.ei8: I prefer to organize my thoughts before speaking
questions.ei9: I feel more energized when with others than alone
questions.ei10: Ideas come to me better when I'm around people
questions.ei11: I prefer expressing myself in writing than in conversation
questions.ei14: I don't mind being in the spotlight
questions.ei15: Silence doesn't feel awkward to me
questions.sn1: I understand explanations better when they're specific
questions.sn2: I tend to see the big picture before details
questions.sn3: I trust things I've actually experienced
questions.sn4: I enjoy imagining possibilities and ideas
questions.sn5: I don't easily believe unverified information
questions.sn6: I think more about 'what could change' than 'why'
questions.sn7: I feel the present reality is more important
questions.sn8: I don't find it hard to work with abstract concepts
questions.sn9: Familiar methods make me feel comfortable
questions.sn10: Ideas without practical potential don't interest me
questions.sn11: I understand explanations better through metaphors
questions.sn12: I focus on information I need right now
questions.sn13: Long-term direction is more important to me
questions.sn15: Even failed new attempts are meaningful
questions.tf1: I find logic more convincing than emotions
questions.tf2: I feel uncomfortable deciding without considering feelings
questions.tf3: I tend to set emotions aside when problem-solving
questions.tf4: In conflict, I worry about the other person's feelings first
questions.tf5: Fairness is often more important than consideration
questions.tf6: I hesitate to be honest if it might hurt someone
questions.tf8: How the other person feels greatly affects my judgment
questions.tf9: I believe work and emotions should be separated
questions.tf10: I'm uncomfortable deciding based only on emotional reasons
questions.tf11: I've often delayed decisions fearing it would hurt relationships
questions.tf13: I think standards can change depending on the situation
questions.tf15: I feel being understood is the start of resolution
questions.jp1: I feel comfortable when I have a plan
questions.jp3: I want to finish deadlines with time to spare
questions.jp4: I don't mind schedules that change with circumstances
questions.jp5: I feel anxious if I don't have a to-do list
questions.jp6: I tend to go with the flow rather than plans
questions.jp9: An organized environment helps me focus
questions.jp12: I find it hard to start without preparation
questions.jp13: I try things even if they're not perfect

ISTJ.name: The Logistician
ISTJ.tagline: Quietly fulfills responsibilities to the end
ISTJ.summary: ISTJs are reliable and responsible types. They value rules and traditions, and have the diligence to complete any task.
weaknesses: Takes time to adapt to change
recovery: Alone time in a quiet space

relationship.style: Expresses love through actions rather than words.

work.style: Plans systematically and executes steadily.

ISTJ.todayAction: Try doing one thing differently than usual

ISFJ.name: The Defender
ISFJ.tagline: Cares for people behind the scenes
ISFJ.summary: ISFJs are warm and dedicated types. They quietly care for those around them and work to create harmonious environments.

relationship.style: Takes care of partner's needs first and remembers small things.
tips: Encourage them to share their needs

work.style: Watches team atmosphere and quietly supports.
tips: Be careful not to overload work

ISFJ.todayAction: Give yourself a small gift today

INFJ.name: The Advocate
INFJ.summary: INFJs have deep insight and strong ideals. They read people's emotions well and want to lead meaningful change.

work.style: Shows creativity in meaningful projects.
tips: Share purpose and meaning of work

growth: Find balance between reality and ideals
INFJ.todayAction: Write down the emotions you felt today

INTJ.name: The Architect
INTJ.summary: INTJs have strong strategic thinking and independence. They set long-term visions and move systematically to realize them.

tips: Expect but don't force emotional expression

work.style: Sees the big picture and executes efficiently.

INTJ.todayAction: Ask a colleague for their opinion first

ISTP.name: The Virtuoso
ISTP.summary: ISTPs are practical and analytical types. They solve problems immediately through action and enjoy hands-on work.

relationship.style: Shows through actions rather than words.

work.style: Excels at practical problem solving.

ISTP.todayAction: Express one thing you felt today in words

ISFP.name: The Adventurer
ISFP.tagline: Lives in the sensation of this moment
ISFP.summary: ISFPs are sensitive and free-spirited types. They fully feel the present moment and express beauty in their own way.

work.style: Shines in creative and practical work.

ISFP.todayAction: Express your feelings through drawing or writing

INFP.name: The Mediator
INFP.summary: INFPs have deep values and rich imagination. They value authenticity and pour passion into meaningful work.

work.style: Shows creativity in meaningful projects.

INFP.todayAction: Make one small decision you've been putting off

INTP.name: The Logician
INTP.summary: INTPs are logical and analytical types. They explore complex problems theoretically and search for new ideas with endless curiosity.

work.style: Analyzes and solves complex problems.

INTP.todayAction: Share one idea you've only been thinking about

ESTP.name: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.summary: ESTPs are energetic and action-oriented types. They enjoy the present moment to the fullest and don't hesitate to take risks.

work.style: Excellent at quick situation judgment and execution.

ESTP.todayAction: Think about the long-term impact of what you're about to do

ESFP.name: The Entertainer
ESFP.tagline: Energy that lights up the room
ESFP.summary: ESFPs are passionate and social types. They enjoy being with people and have the ability to brighten any atmosphere.

work.style: Collaborates with people and leads atmosphere.

ESFP.todayAction: Spend just 5 minutes quietly alone today

ENFP.name: The Campaigner
ENFP.summary: ENFPs are passionate and creative types. They explore new possibilities and inspire people.

work.style: Shines in creative and people-centered projects.

ENFP.todayAction: Finish one thing you started today

ENTP.name: The Debater
ENTP.summary: ENTPs are argumentative and innovative types. They enjoy ideas that break conventions and love intellectual challenges.

work.style: Pours ideas into innovative projects.

ESTJ.name: The Executive
ESTJ.summary: ESTJs are organized and responsible types. They value clear structure and rules and achieve goals efficiently.

work.style: Organizes team and leads toward goals.

ESTJ.todayAction: Listen to someone's opinion completely today

ESFJ.name: The Consul
ESFJ.summary: ESFJs are warm and social types. They care for those around them and work to create harmonious environments.

tips: Encourage them to share their needs

work.style: Watches team atmosphere and leads collaboration.

ENFJ.name: The Protagonist
ENFJ.summary: ENFJs are charismatic and inspiring types. They discover people's potential and help them grow.

tips: Encourage them to care for themselves

work.style: Inspires team and leads toward goals.

ENFJ.todayAction: Make one decision for yourself today

ENTJ.name: The Commander
ENTJ.summary: ENTJs are decisive and strategic types. They set big visions and lead teams to realize them.

work.style: Organizes team and leads powerfully toward goals.

ENTJ.todayAction: Ask a team member how they feel first

tetoEgen.title: TETOÂ·EGEN Type Test

intro.title: Discover Your TETOÂ·EGEN Type
intro.description: Find out how you handle conflict situations
intro.tetoDesc: Confrontational - Tends to directly resolve problems

tetoEgen.disclaimer: This test is for entertainment purposes only and is not a professional psychological assessment.

share.codeLabel: Share this code to compare with friends

compare.title: Compare with Friends/Partner
compare.description: Enter your friend's share code to check compatibility
compare.perfect: Perfect match! You complement each other perfectly
compare.good: Great compatibility! You create synergy together
compare.normal: Good relationship, but requires effort to understand each other
compare.challenging: Challenging relationship, but can be an opportunity for growth

mbtiConnection.title: MBTI Connection
mbtiConnection.description: MBTI types often associated with this type

questions.te1: I try to resolve conflicts immediately when they arise
questions.te2: I often hold back what I want to say to avoid hurting others
questions.te3: I think it's better to speak directly about problems
questions.te4: I avoid uncomfortable conversations to protect relationships
questions.te6: I tend to consider others' feelings first
questions.te7: If I think I'm right, I persist with my opinion
questions.te8: I believe compromise is better for relationships than conflict
questions.te9: Analyzing the root cause of problems is important
questions.te10: I wait for the other person to initiate reconciliation
questions.te11: I focus a lot on relationship recovery after conflicts
questions.te12: Problems should be resolved quickly before they escalate
questions.te14: I try to understand the other person's position first
questions.te15: I think avoiding conflict makes problems worse
questions.te16: People sometimes say I'm too aggressive
questions.te17: A harmonious atmosphere is more important than efficiency
questions.te18: Wrong things should be pointed out immediately
questions.te19: I phrase things carefully to avoid hurting others
questions.te20: Process conflicts are okay if the result is good
questions.di1: I say what I mean directly without beating around the bush
questions.di2: I read the room before choosing when to speak
questions.di4: I adjust my expression style based on the situation
questions.di6: Sometimes I hope others will pick up on hints
questions.di8: I tend to soften my words
questions.di9: I speak concisely, focusing on key points
questions.di10: I anticipate others' reactions before speaking
questions.cw1: I focus on facts rather than emotions in conversations
questions.cw2: I try to read others' emotions first
questions.cw5: I tend to state conclusions first
questions.cw6: I make others feel comfortable in conversations
questions.cw8: Conversations flow better in a warm atmosphere
questions.cw9: Emotional conversations feel difficult for me
questions.cw10: I often express empathy when others speak

leader.name: Leader
leader.tagline: The one who provides solutions and leads
leader.summary: Quickly finds solutions in conflict situations and takes charge to resolve issues. A type that leads with clear communication and logical approach.

conflict.style: Immediately analyzes causes and proposes solutions when problems arise. Focuses on facts over emotions and prefers quick decisions.
tips: Add a word acknowledging others' feelings
Don't try to solve everything alone

communication.style: Communicates directly and clearly. Tends to quickly grasp the core and state conclusions first.

relationship.style: A reliable partner who's solid at problem-solving.
relationship.ideal: Works well with warm EGEN types who can help with emotional exchange

work.style: Excels in roles that lead projects and make decisions.
work.role: A leader who sets team direction and removes obstacles

growth: See emotions as data - use others' feelings as information
Pause before speaking - listen before reacting
Value the process of working together over perfect solutions
leader.todayAction: Before offering a solution, ask 'How do you feel about this?'

strategy.name: Strategist
strategy.summary: Takes a balanced approach to resolve conflicts while maintaining relationships. A strategist who gets desired results while respecting others.

conflict.style: Identifies the essence of conflict and finds solutions while considering others. Skilled at persuasion and negotiation.
tips: Remember that direct expression is sometimes needed
Don't be too concerned about others' reactions

communication.style: Reads situations and communicates appropriately. Can be warm yet clear.

relationship.ideal: Creates good synergy with other TETO types who can work toward goals together

work.style: Excels in roles requiring negotiation and coordination.
work.role: A coordinator handling inter-team adjustment and stakeholder management

growth: Accept that being direct is sometimes okay
Remember that conflict is part of growth
strategy.todayAction: Express one thing directly today without hedging

coolhead.name: Coolhead
coolhead.tagline: An observer who analyzes situations objectively
coolhead.summary: Analyzes situations objectively without being swayed by emotions. Steps back to see the big picture and finds optimal solutions.

conflict.style: Excludes emotions and focuses on facts in conflict. Uses logical analysis to identify the core of problems.
tips: Acknowledge that emotions are important too
Show that you care about others

communication.style: Communicates indirectly but objectively. Prefers conversations based on data and facts.

relationship.ideal: Balances well with warm types who can help with emotional expression

work.style: Excels in analysis and strategy development.
work.role: An advisor providing data analysis and objective judgment

growth: Practice expressing emotions - feelings matter as much as thoughts
Take action - analysis is a tool for action
Invest in relationships - people matter as much as data
coolhead.todayAction: Say 'That must have been hard' to show empathy

driver.name: Driver
driver.tagline: An executor who pushes gently but persistently
driver.summary: Shows change through action rather than direct words. Achieves goals with gentle but unwavering persistence.

conflict.style: Takes indirect approaches rather than direct confrontation but never gives up. Creates desired results even if it takes time.
tips: Remember direct conversation can be faster sometimes
Ask for help instead of handling alone

communication.style: Communicates warmly and considerately but conveys key points indirectly.
watch: True intentions may not come across

relationship.style: A reliable partner who never gives up.
relationship.ideal: Works well with direct types who can help with clear expression

work.style: Excels in long-term projects and continuous improvement.
work.role: An executor who quietly drives team momentum

growth: Experience that being direct doesn't destroy relationships
Practice getting recognition for your contributions
Accept that quick feedback is sometimes needed
driver.todayAction: Start a conversation you've been putting off

care.name: Caregiver
care.tagline: A protector who takes direct care of others
care.summary: Steps up directly to take care of others when problems arise. A type that protects relationships through practical help and direct care.

conflict.style: Prioritizes relationship maintenance over conflict, but steps up directly when needed. Has a strong desire to protect others.
tips: Don't try to solve everything for others
Give others space to solve things themselves

communication.style: Communicates directly yet warmly. Says what's needed while being considerate.

relationship.ideal: Works well with independent types who can accept care

work.style: Takes care of team members and provides practical support.
work.role: A caretaker responsible for team stability and member wellbeing

growth: Practice receiving help as much as giving
Leave space for others to grow
care.todayAction: When you want to help someone, just say 'Let me know if you need anything'

buffer.name: Mediator
buffer.tagline: A mediator who harmonizes between conflicts
buffer.summary: Takes on the role of understanding and mediating both sides in conflict. Creates harmony with warm and flexible approaches.

conflict.style: Becomes a bridge connecting both sides rather than avoiding conflict. Finds solutions by helping each side understand the other.
tips: Don't lose your own opinion while mediating
Accept you don't need to intervene in every conflict

communication.style: Communicates with balance - direct yet attentive to others' feelings.

relationship.ideal: Balances well with types who express opinions clearly

work.style: Excels in inter-team conflict resolution and collaboration.
work.role: A mediator who creates team harmony and resolves conflicts

growth: Treat your opinions as important too
Accept you're not responsible for solving all conflicts
Remember that conflict can be a growth opportunity

empathy.name: Empath
empathy.tagline: A companion who deeply understands and stands with you
empathy.summary: Deeply understands others' emotions and stands with them. A type that provides emotional support rather than direct solutions.

conflict.style: Focuses on others' feelings rather than conflict. Understanding hearts comes before solving problems.
tips: Remember that solutions are important too, not just empathy
Take care of your own feelings too
Accept that distance is sometimes needed

communication.style: Reads others' emotions and communicates accordingly. Prefers deep conversations.
watch: May get too absorbed in others' emotions

relationship.style: A partner who deeply understands and accompanies you.
relationship.ideal: Works well with warm types who can express and receive emotions

work.style: Excels in roles that understand and support team members' hearts.
work.role: A supporter responsible for team's emotional stability

growth: Practice expressing your own opinions too
Remember you don't need to carry all emotions
empathy.todayAction: After listening to someone, ask 'May I share my thoughts too?'

balance.name: Balancer
balance.tagline: A harmonizer who leads situations with balance
balance.summary: Takes a balanced approach considering both relationships and situations. Creates best results by taking time without rushing.

conflict.style: Resolves conflicts with time rather than rushing. Seeks methods acceptable to everyone.
tips: Accept that quick decisions are sometimes needed
Sometimes progress matters more than perfect balance

communication.style: Communicates softly and carefully. Adjusts flexibly to situations and people.

relationship.ideal: Works well with patient types who can grow together slowly

work.style: Maintains team stability from a long-term perspective.
work.role: A stabilizer who sets team balance and long-term direction

growth: Accept that decisions are sometimes more important than perfect balance
Remember that change is part of balance
balance.todayAction: When you want to postpone a decision, make one small decision anyway

roulette.title: Roulette Wheel
roulette.description: Quickly add items and make fair random selections
roulette.multiPlaceholder:
Enter multiple items (one per line)
Example:
Pizza
Sushi
Salad

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Utils Hub ("this site") values your privacy and complies with applicable laws and regulations.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: This site does not collect personal information. All data is stored only in your browser (localStorage) and is not transmitted to any server.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: This site uses Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google may use cookies to show ads based on your interests.
advertising.optout: You can opt out of personalized advertising in Google Ads Settings:

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.localStorage: Test results and settings are stored in your browser's localStorage.
cookies.adsense: Google AdSense may use cookies for advertising purposes.
cookies.clear: You can delete cookies and stored data at any time through your browser settings.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Data stored in localStorage is automatically deleted after 30 days or can be manually deleted by the user.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us through GitHub Issues.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: This privacy policy may be updated due to legal changes or service updates. Any changes will be posted on this page.

introduction.title: Service Introduction
introduction.content: Utils Hub ("this service") is a web service that provides various online utility tools for free. These Terms of Service set forth the basic rules for using the service.

conditions.title: Terms of Use
conditions.item1: This service is available to everyone for free.
conditions.item2: Users must comply with applicable laws and these terms when using the service.
conditions.item3: The service may not be used to infringe on others' rights or for illegal purposes.

services.title: Services Provided
services.content: This service provides the following utility tools:
services.item1: Games/Random tools: Ladder game, Roulette, Number picker, Team divider, etc.
services.item2: Developer tools: JSON parser, UUID generator, Timestamp converter, etc.
services.item3: Converter tools: Image converter, QR code generator, Metadata extractor, etc.
services.item4: Text tools: Encoding/decoding, Hash generation, String conversion, etc.
services.item5: Calculators: D-day calculator, Unit converter, etc.

data.title: Data Processing
data.item1: All data processing occurs in the user's browser and is not transmitted to any server.
data.item2: Some features use the browser's localStorage to store data.
data.item3: Stored data can be deleted by the user directly or through browser settings.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: This service displays advertisements through Google AdSense. Advertising is used to operate and maintain the service.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.item1: This service is provided "as is" and does not guarantee fitness for any particular purpose.
disclaimer.item2: We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from use of the service.
disclaimer.item3: We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the service.
disclaimer.item4: We may change or discontinue the service without prior notice.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The design, logo, software, and other intellectual property rights of this service belong to Utils Hub. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or modification is prohibited.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: These Terms of Service may be changed as needed, and changes will be posted on this page. Changed terms take effect immediately upon posting.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For inquiries about the Terms of Service, please contact us through GitHub Issues.

methods.title: Contact Methods
methods.content: For inquiries, suggestions, or bug reports about Utils Hub, please contact us through the following methods.

github.title: GitHub Issues
github.content: We accept feature requests, bug reports, and improvement suggestions through GitHub Issues.

bug.title: Bug Report
bug.content: Please let us know about any errors or issues you encounter while using the service.

feature.title: Feature Request
feature.content: Share your ideas for new tools or features.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: Send us your opinions or suggestions for service improvement.

privacy.title: Privacy Related
privacy.content: For inquiries about privacy, please contact us separately.

response.title: Response Information
response.content: We review and respond to inquiries in order. Please understand that it may take time to respond.

intro.title: Service Introduction
intro.content: Utils Hub is a web service that provides various free online utility tools for daily life and development. You can use them directly in your browser without any installation.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.content: All data processing occurs in your browser and is not transmitted to any server.

fast.title: Fast Speed
fast.content: We provide a fast and responsive user experience using the latest web technologies.

language.title: Multi-language Support
language.content: We support Korean and English, with more languages planned.

theme.title: Dark Mode
theme.content: We support both light and dark modes for a comfortable viewing experience.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.content: We provide optimized screens for all devices including PC, tablet, and mobile.

games.title: Games/Random
games.content: Ladder game, Roulette, Number picker, Team divider, Fortune, MBTI test, etc.

developer.title: Developer Tools
developer.content: JSON parser, UUID generator, Timestamp converter, Password generator

converter.title: Converter Tools
converter.content: Image converter, QR code generator, Image metadata extractor

text.title: Text Tools
text.content: Base64, URL encoding/decoding, MD5/SHA hash, Case conversion

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.content: Utils Hub is an open source project. You can view and contribute to the source code on GitHub.
